dmca.title: SEO Image complains of copied text
dmca.body:
Dear Google Customer Support Professionals,

1)	The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on: http://www.seoimage.com/link_popularity.html

2)	Search Query:
"An authority domain is considered an authority because everyone links to it without reciprocation of the link"
http: //www.google.com/search?q=%22An+authority+domain+is+considered+an+
authority+because+everyone+links+to+it+without+reciprocation+of+the+link%22&
hl=en&Ir=&rIs=GGGL,GGGL:2005-09,GGGL:en&start=0&sa=N&filter=0

and
"One-Way links are links that are common for all "Authority Domains"
http://www.google.com/search?hl=en&Ir=&g=%22One-Way+links+are+links+that+are+common+
for+all+%22Authority+Domains%22&btnG=Search

Infringing Web Pages: http://www.submitshop.com/link_popularity/


3)	My Contact Information: [private]@seoimage.com
212[private]
[private] (cell)

4)	Infringer's Contact Information:
[private]
[private]@megrisoft.com
[private]
Chandigarh
null,160036
IN
Tel. +91.[private]
[private]mearisoft.biz
http://www.submitshop.com/temp/contact.htm

5)	I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
 
6) I Swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the Copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is
allegedly infringed. Sincerely,

[private] CEO SEO Image, Inc.
[private]
New York, NY 10022
